verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> Him, O <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>
You <S%H7945>who<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> In the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God!<s%>
<S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> <S%H2167>Sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to His <S%H8034>name,<s%> for it is <S%H5273>lovely.<s%>
For the <S%H3050>Lord<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for Himself, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for His own <S%H5459>possession.<s%>
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H1419>great,<s%> And that our <S%H136>Lord<s%> is <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H3605>Whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2654>pleases,<s%> He <S%H6213>does,<s%> In <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and in <S%H776>earth,<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8415>deeps.<s%>

He causes the <S%H9347>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> Who <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain;<s%> Who <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> from His <S%H214>treasuries.<s%>
He <S%H5221>smote<s%> the first-born of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4480>Both<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> into your <S%H8432>midst,<s%> O <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> Upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
He <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%>

<S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> And <S%H5747>Og,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%>
And He <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> as a <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> A <S%H5159>heritage<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> His <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%> Thy <S%H2143>remembrance,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1777>judge<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%> And will <S%H5162>have<s%> <S%H5162>compassion<s%> on His <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
The <S%H6091>idols<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are [but] <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> The <S%H4639>work<s%> of man's <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
They have <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> but they do not <S%H1696>speak;<s%> They have <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but they do not <S%H7200>see;<s%>
They have <S%H241>ears,<s%> but they do not <S%H238>hear;<s%> <S%H369>Nor<s%> is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H3426>any<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> at <S%H637>all<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouths.<s%>
Those who <S%H6213>make<s%> them will be <S%H3644>like<s%> them, [Yes,] <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H982>trusts<s%> in them.
O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%>
O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> You who <S%H3372>revere<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> Who <S%H7931>dwells<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%>
